Class GraphStats

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.graph.misc.GraphStats
public final class GraphStats
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides basic statistic functions for graphs.

Version:
$Revision: 1.10 $ $Date: 2003/03/19 14:00:40 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger
